reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://install.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content types' menu link.
Click the 'Add content type' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content types dialog'.
Enter 'abe29dd3b1' in the 'Name' text box.
Click the 'Save and add fields' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'abe29dd3b1 dialog'.
STEP 3
Enter '59b70f939a1f4af' in the 'Add new field' text box.
Select 'File' from the 'Field Type' drop down list.
Select 'File' from the 'Widget' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '59b70f939a1f4af dialog'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '59b70f939a1f4af dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Updated field 59b70f939a1f4af field settings.' is present.
STEP 4
Verify the 'File directory' value is '[current-date:custom:Y]/[current-date:custom:m]'.
STEP 5
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'abe29dd3b1 dialog'.
Enter '6b4008c57eaf4dd' in the 'Add new field' text box.
Select 'Image' from the 'Field Type' drop down list.
Select 'Image' from the 'Widget' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '6b4008c57eaf4dd dialog'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '6b4008c57eaf4dd dialog'.
STEP 6
Verify success message of 'Updated field 6b4008c57eaf4dd field settings.' is present.
Verify the 'File directory' value is '[current-date:custom:Y]/[current-date:custom:m]'.
STEP 7
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'abe29dd3b1 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Saved 6b4008c57eaf4dd configuration.' is present.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Your settings have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 8 - N/A
STEP 9
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'abe29dd3b1' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create abe29dd3b1 dialog'.
Enter '194736aca10747b' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create abe29dd3b1 dialog'.
Enter '/Users/brandonclark/SQE-TEST-Pub7/main/src/test/java/com/nbcuni/test/publisher/content/MediaFiles/HanSolo1.jpg' in the '6b4008c57eaf4dd' custom file upload field.
Click the 'Upload' button for custom field '6b4008c57eaf4dd'.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'abe29dd3b1 194736aca10747b has been created.' is present.
Assert that img source of the Media Item contains '2014/08/HanSolo'.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
STEP 10-11
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content types' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Manage fields' menu link.
Click the 'Cover Photo' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Cover Photo dialog'.
Verify the 'File directory' value is '[current-date:custom:Y]/[current-date:custom:m]'.
STEP 12 - TODO
